reviews.review_msg: Sasha is amazing. She is funny, approachable, respectful of everyone's opinions, and a fair marker, all around the ideal prof. The exams and assignments were very fair. She made WL a very enjoyable elective.

Sasha is seriously amazing! She's friendly, kind, encouraging, and funny. She really listens to what everyone has to say, and doesn't discredit anyone. She's passionate about the subject, and very clear on assignment expectations. She's also a very fair marker! Love her.
